service.name: app-monitor
service.description: Dashboard to monitor and control all running scenarios with real-time health checks and performance metrics

postgres.purpose: Store app metadata, monitoring data, status logs, and metrics

redis.purpose: Real-time event streaming, caching, and app notifications

ollama.purpose: AI-powered analysis for unhealthy apps and performance optimization recommendations

setup.description: Initialize App Monitor with database schema and automation workflows

steps.name: generate-embeddings
steps.run: vrooli resource qdrant embeddings refresh --force || echo "Embeddings generation skipped (not critical)"
steps.description: Generate code embeddings for AI assistance

steps.name: build-api
steps.run: cd api && go mod download && go build -o app-monitor-api .

steps.name: install-ui-deps
steps.description: Install UI dependencies for React app

steps.name: verify-docker-access
steps.run: docker version > /dev/null && echo 'âœ… Docker access verified' || echo 'âŒ Docker access required for app monitoring'
steps.description: Verify Docker access for app monitoring

steps.name: show-urls

develop.description: Start app monitor with Go API server

steps.name: start-api
steps.description: Start Go coordination API server in background

steps.name: ensure-ui-bundle
steps.run: cd ui && if [ ! -f dist/index.html ]; then echo 'UI bundle missing; running npm run build'; npm run build; elif find src -type f -newer dist/index.html -print -quit | grep -q .; then echo 'UI sources changed; rebuilding'; npm run build; elif [ -d public ] && find public -type f -newer dist/index.html -print -quit | grep -q .; then echo 'UI static assets changed; rebuilding'; npm run build; elif [ index.html -nt dist/index.html ] || [ vite.config.ts -nt dist/index.html ]; then echo 'UI configuration changed; rebuilding'; npm run build; else echo 'UI bundle up to date'; fi
steps.description: Ensure production UI bundle is current before starting server

steps.name: start-ui
steps.description: Start Express server with built React app

steps.name: show-running-services

dev.description: Start app monitor in development mode with hot reload

steps.name: start-api
steps.description: Start Go coordination API server in background

steps.name: start-vite-dev
steps.run: cd ui && VITE_PORT=${VITE_PORT} npm run dev
steps.description: Start Vite dev server with hot reload

steps.name: show-dev-services

test.description: Test app monitor API and CLI

steps.name: test-go-build
steps.run: cd api && go build -o test-build . && rm test-build

steps.name: test-docker-access
steps.description: Test Docker API access through app monitor
